title: Capitol Police Officer Charged With Obstruction of Justice Related to Jan. 6 Riot
sub_head: Michael Riley allegedly told a contact on Facebook to delete posts showing that the person was at the Capitol
body:
WASHINGTON—A 25-year veteran of the U.S. Capitol Police force was arrested Friday and accused of urging a man who participated in the Jan. 6 riot to cover his tracks on social media, authorities said.
In an indictment dated Thursday and unsealed Friday, Michael Riley was charged with two counts of obstructing justice for allegedly telling the contact on Facebook to delete posts that showed he was at the Capitol on Jan. 6 when a pro-Trump mob tried to stop the certification of President Biden’s election.
